event.title: FSFE at FrOSCon in Sankt Augustin, Deutschland

body.p: FSFE will be present at the Free and Open Source Software Conference (FrOSCon) with a booth, several talks and a reading: Johannes NÃ¤der, FSFE policy project manager, will give a talk on "It's not just about money!" ("Geld ist nicht alles!'") on 17.08., 16:30 in room HS8, explaining approaches for better Free Software procurement. Right afterwards (17:45) in the same room, Bernhard Reiter will encourage voluntary payments for Free Software in his talk "Just pay for it!!? - your Free Software!" ("Bezahlt sie doch einfach!!? - eure Freie Software"). As part of the children's programme, Isabel Drost-Fromm will read Matthias Kirschner's book "Ada and Zangemann - A Tale of Software, Skateboards, and Raspberry Ice Cream" (17.08., 14:00, HS6). We will be hosting an NGI0 Open Consultation Hour at our booth, where you can ask questions about NGI Zero applications (time to be announced).
Our talks and most of the conference will be in German. You do not need to buy a ticket or register. Just drop by!
